install.name: System - Ban IP Address
install.author: Sam Moffatt
install.copyright: (C) 2008 Toowoomba Regional Council/Sam Moffatt. All rights reserved.
install.description: Blocks users based on network masks or IP addresses

param.name: message
param.default: Your IP address has been blocked
param.label: Blocked Message
param.description: The message to be displayed to user if a redirect location isn't set

param.name: redirect_location
param.label: Redirect Location
param.description: The full path to a location to redirect the user to instead of displaying a message; note: do not set this to a Joomla! location as this will cause a redirect loop

param.name: frontmode
param.label: Site Block Mode
param.description: Determines the mode to use when blocking users. Whitelist only ensures that only users on the white list are let in, black list only ensures that anyone but the blacklist are let in

param.name: backmode
param.label: Administrator Block Mode
param.description: Determines the mode to use when blocking users. Whitelist only ensures that only users on the white list are let in, black list only ensures that anyone but the blacklist are let in

param.name: ip_list_front
param.label: IP List Site
param.description: IP addresses or ranges for the front end/site (new line seperated)

param.name: ip_list_back
param.label: IP List Administrator
param.description: IP addresses or ranges for the backend end/administrator (new line seperated)
